plot: A pair of lovers murder the man's wife so they can be together. However, the body is never recovered and signs start appearing that suggest she may still be alive.
title: Angaeneun yeojacheoleom sogsaginda
plot_es: A pair of lovers murder the man's wife so they can be together. However, the body is never recovered and signs start appearing that suggest she may still be alive.
plot_en: A pair of lovers murder the man's wife so they can be together. However, the body is never recovered and signs start appearing that suggest she may still be alive.
